!High Summoner Galatea: First, go to *Trader Lara of Dion Castle Town* and have your Arcana Cards made. You cannot enter into battle with another Summoner without one of these cards. You must battle and defeat 6 Summoners in order to pass the Trial of the Summoner. Do you have any other questions?
